ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared.job
Class ElementaryJobAdapter

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared.job.ElementaryJobAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ElementaryJob, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
public abstract class ElementaryJobAdapter
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ElementaryJob

Convenient adapter class to implement a Job. Basic required functionality (evaluation counting, job listener notifications, ...) of a job is already implemented.

Author:
Moritz Lang
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

ElementaryJobAdapter

public ElementaryJobAdapter(Well well,
                            int[] positionInformation)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Constructor.

Parameters:
well - The well to which the job belongs, or null, if the job does not belong to a well.
positionInformation - An integer array expressing to which position (e.g. tile number) the job belongs.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
Method Detail

assertRunning

public void assertRunning()
                   throws MeasurementRunningException
Convenient method to throw an exception if a parameter of a job should be changed, but the job is currently executed. Should be called at the beginning of every function which is manipulating the parameters of the job (i.e. all "set" methods).

Throws:
MeasurementRunningException

isRunning

public boolean isRunning()
Returns true if the measurement the job belongs to is currently executed.

Returns:
True if the job is currently executed.

getEvaluationNo

public int getEvaluationNo()
Returns the current number of how often the job is executed.

Returns:
Number of executions of the job (starting at 0) or -1, if the job is yet not executed.

executeJob

public void executeJob(Microscope microscope)
                throws SettingException,
                       MicroscopeException,
                       DeviceException,
                       MicroscopeLockedException,
                       java.lang.InterruptedException,
                       java.rmi.RemoteException
The standard implementation of this function automatically takes care for evaluation counting and the notification of listeners. Do not overwrite this function, but runJob() instead (which is called by this implementation)

Specified by:
executeJob in interface ElementaryJob
Parameters:
microscope - Interface to control and get information of the microscope.
Throws:
SettingException
MicroscopeException
DeviceException
MicroscopeLockedException
java.lang.InterruptedException
java.rmi.RemoteException

runJob

public abstract void runJob(Microscope microscope)
                     throws SettingException,
                            DeviceException,
                            MicroscopeException,
                            MicroscopeLockedException,
                            java.lang.InterruptedException,
                            java.rmi.RemoteException
Convenient function which gets called by executeJob(). Does not have to take care for execution counting and notification of job listeners. Overwrite this method instead of executeJob.

Parameters:
microscope - The microscope on which this job should be executed.
Throws:
SettingException
DeviceException
MicroscopeException
MicroscopeLockedException
java.lang.InterruptedException
java.rmi.RemoteException

getWell

public Well getWell()
Description copied from interface: ElementaryJob
Returns the jobs' well or null, if job is not belonging to a well measurement.

Specified by:
getWell in interface ElementaryJob
Returns:
A two dimensional array, where the first element identifies the y-position of the well and the second the x, both starting at 0. Returns null if not a well measurement.

getPositionInformation

public int[] getPositionInformation()
Description copied from interface: ElementaryJob
Returns the job's position information.

Specified by:
getPositionInformation in interface ElementaryJob
Returns:
Position information vector.

setJobName

public void setJobName(java.lang.String jobName)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                       MeasurementRunningException
Description copied from interface: ElementaryJob
Sets the name/short description of the current job. Usually, the default description of a job contains already sufficient information. However, for some measurement types it can be of advantage to rename certain jobs which have a specific meaning for the respective measurement.

Specified by:
setJobName in interface ElementaryJob
Parameters:
jobName - Name/short description of the job.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

getDefaultJobName

public abstract java.lang.String getDefaultJobName()
                                            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Should return a default name for the job type which gets returned by getJobName() if no job name was set explicitly by setJobName.

Returns:
Default job name. Should be short, but however informative.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
